Title: Limits tinted green and brown to compostable bags for the purposes of bag waste reduction
Summary: Provides that bags exempt from bag waste reduction shall not be tinted green or brown unless it is a compostable bag.
LawCode: Amd ยง27-2801, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to limiting tinted green and brown to compostable bags for the purposes of bag waste reduction
